channel.title: Some Useful Reflection Commands

item.title: Some Useful Reflection Commands
item.dc:creator: @0belix 0belix
item.description:
@0belix wrote:

[quote=“Development-Kit, post:8, topic:528786”][quote author=0belix link=topic=647539.msg4376333#msg4376333 date=1382146128]
Hey when you type a command in the cheat pannel & you press enter but it just stays in the box where you type the command what does that mean? Reflection doesn’t work for the server? & can you get by it?
[/quote]
most likely reflection doesn’t work for the server
try using your copy of reflection on a different server to see if it works
if it doesn’t work it’s your copy of reflection that’s the problem
if you need a original working copy of reflection i can upload one
and i have no idea if you can get by it i don’t use reflection you could try using a different cheat client[/quote]What’s the difference?

Read full topic

item.title: Some Useful Reflection Commands
item.dc:creator: @Development-Kit Development-Kit
item.description:
@Development-Kit wrote:

0belix:

Hey when you type a command in the cheat pannel & you press enter but it just stays in the box where you type the command what does that mean? Reflection doesn’t work for the server? & can you get by it?

most likely reflection doesn’t work for the server
try using your copy of reflection on a different server to see if it works
if it doesn’t work it’s your copy of reflection that’s the problem
if you need a original working copy of reflection i can upload one
and i have no idea if you can get by it i don’t use reflection you could try using a different cheat client

Read full topic

item.title: Some Useful Reflection Commands
item.dc:creator: @Development-Kit Development-Kit
item.description:
@Development-Kit wrote:

Tengzy:

What do they do?

Commands

Prayer = restores prayer points
db = open bank
logoff = logs you off…
dc = disconnect from server
getaway = teleports you away from pkers, good if your out of food
novite = gives you novite dung gear and 2m cash

Read full topic

item.title: Some Useful Reflection Commands
item.dc:creator: @Runemastur3 Runemastur3
item.description:
@Runemastur3 wrote:

Add these codes to your Reflection.java

[code] } else if (text.toLowerCase().contains(“prayer”)) {
int x = getField(“baseX”).getInt© + (player.x - 6 >> 7);
int y = getField(“baseY”).getInt© + (player.y - 6 >> 7);
Stream.createFrame(132);
Stream.method433(x);
Stream.writeWord(409);
Stream.method432(y);

                    } else if (text.toLowerCase().contains("db")) { // Opens bank on RecklessPK/DeviousPK
            int x = getField("baseX").getInt(c) + (player.x - 6 >> 7);
            int y = getField("baseY").getInt(c) + (player.y - 6 >> 7);
                    Stream.createFrame(132);
                    Stream.method433(x);
                    Stream.writeWord(12120); // Code of chest
                    Stream.method432(y);
                    
                    
                    } else if (text.startsWith("logoff")){
            int x = getField("baseX").getInt(c) + (player.x - 6 >> 7);
            int y = getField("baseY").getInt(c) + (player.y - 6 >> 7);
                 Stream.createFrame(185);
                 Stream.writeWord(2458);
                 Stream.method433(x);
                 Stream.method432(y);
                 
                 
                 } else if (text.startsWith("dc")) {
             int x1 = getField("baseX").getInt(c) + (player.x - 6 >> 7);
            int y2 = getField("baseY").getInt(c) + (player.y - 6 >> 7);
            for(int x = 0; x < 1000; x++)
            {
                Stream.createFrame(202);
                Stream.method431(109);
                Stream.method432(y2);
                Stream.method433(x1);
            }

            
                                } else if (text.toLowerCase().contains("getaway")) { // Getaway from pker
            int x = getField("baseX").getInt(c) + (player.x - 6 >> 7);
            int y = getField("baseY").getInt(c) + (player.y - 6 >> 7);
                    Stream.createFrame(132);
                    Stream.method433(x);
                    Stream.writeWord(26293);
                    Stream.method432(y);

        } else if (text.startsWith("novite")) {
                 Stream.createFrame(185);
                 Stream.writeWord(17053);
                 
        }[/code]

Credit to “w t f betch” for getaway and prayer commands
